_defaults.essay: AES-ESSAY - Required for dimensional scores (TA, CC, Vocab, Grammar)
_defaults.corpus: AES-CORPUS - Best scorer (0.96 correlation with human labels)
_defaults.feedback: AES-FEEDBACK - Experimental, incomplete training (OFF by default)
_defaults.gecSeq2seq: GEC-SEQ2SEQ - Best GEC with precise diffs (slow: 12-16s)
_defaults.gecGector: GEC-GECTOR - Fast GEC using token tagging (fast: 1-2s)
_defaults.gecLlm: GEC-LLM - Expensive ($0.002/sub), redundant with gecSeq2seq (OFF by default)
